old: 話しかけてくるなんて珍しいね
column2: It's rare for someone to come and talk to me like this.

old:
アンタ、覚者ってやつなんでしょ？
何かすごいことしてみせてよ
空を飛ぶとか――
column2: You're one of those Arisen, right? Why don't you show us something amazing, like flying in the sky or something?

old:
王家側も、まさかアタシたち盗賊に
協力を要請するようなことになるなんて
思わなかっただろうね
column2:
Even the royal family, never would have thought
they would end up asking for cooperation from us bandits...

old:
アタシとしても
国は平和な方がいいからさ
column2: For me too, I prefer the country to be peaceful.
